contenttransfer-extension-description: Enables pushing content from one wiki to another
content-transfer-namespace-not-found: Namespace "$1" not found on receiving wiki. Create the namespace and try transfering this page again
content-transfer-edit-fail: Page cannot be edited on receiving wiki
content-transfer-upload-fail: File cannot be uploaded to receiving wiki
right-content-transfer: Allows users to transfer content to other wikis
action-content-transfer: You do not have permission to transfer content
content-transfer-page-protected: Page is protected, you can try to force retry the transfer
content-transfer-only-modified-help: Show only pages that have been modified since the last transfer. This will also affect related pages.
content-transfer-too-many-pages-warning: Page list is truncated due to configured limit of  {{PLURAL:$2|one page|$2 pages}} pages per push. Total of {{PLURAL:$1|1 page|$1 pages}} pages fit the criteria
apihelp-content-transfer-get-pages-summa: Lists all pages that are pushable based on given filters
apihelp-content-transfer-push-info-summa: Retrieves all resources such as included files, linked pages etc. of the page, that is about to be transferd to a target wiki
apihelp-content-transfer-do-push-single-: Transfers a singe page to a target wiki
apihelp-content-transfer-purge-pages-sum: Purges all pages that were transfered to the target wiki
contenttransfer-apihelp-param-filterdata: JSON string of data to filter for
contenttransfer-apihelp-param-titles: Pipe seperated list of page names
contenttransfer-apihelp-param-onlymodifi: Bool. Set if only pages should get transfered that have been modified since the last content transfer
contenttransfer-apihelp-param-modifiedsi: Date string. Transfer only pages, that have been modified since
contenttransfer-apihelp-param-includerel: Bool. Set if also resources such as linked pages, files and categories of the page should get transfered
contenttransfer-apihelp-param-articleid: Interger. Id of the page, that should get transfered
contenttransfer-apihelp-param-force: Bool. Ignore warings and transfer anyways
